description: London is the kind of pain slut that every sadist wants to get their hands on. She sexualizes her suffering as she settles into the inescapable bondage that holds her hostage. She suffers through four grueling bondage positions that test her body and bend her in ways very few can tolerate. She endures it all and begs for more until the vibe shows up. The vibe is her kryptonite, her one weakness that she can hardly endure. She begs and screams for it to be removed, but not until The Pope is sure that she has had enough.
title: Pain Slut Begs for Penance
